subject: Order #SSN5417
description_text:
Hello Simsonn,

I think I forgot to get the two brackets to attach the vibration motors to my control unit. Is it possible to add them?

Thx

Julien

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Julien SCHAUB,  The standard bracket is included by default. If you need a horizontal bracket, it must be purchased separately.

Hello Simsonn,

I received my package with the pedals, thank you.

I did not receive the rest of the order, including the vibration motors.

Thank you

Julien Schaub
________________________________
De : service@simsonn.com
